resources.string:
"Welcome
" "
" "Who is the developer of the "
" applications:
" " "
"An application developer is a person who creates, tests and programs applications for computers.
" "
" "Apps are used in almost every type of computer, from desktops to mobile devices, and app developers are the brains and fingers behind the greatest gaming, email, and processing functions of all the apps we see today.
" "
" "An application developer works in teams to define ideas and concepts for the general public, or specific work that the client offers them.
" "
" "Application developers are able to crystallize those ideas and create flowcharts so that every part of the concept is thought and accounted for.
" "
" "Understands programming and coding languages ​​in all their codes
" "
" "Depending on the job, application developers may also work with graphic designers to create the perfect image of an application.
" "
